They are great for under shirt or wearing around the house but I won’t be wearing in public without a bra. I’m about a B cup right now and you can see my mom nips from afar!!! I’d have to wear a shirt or sweater over in public though cause my mama nips are showing and ones going north while the other is headed east 😂🤣!!!  10/10!!!!

类型: Special Size: Waist LengthSize: Medium-LargeColor: White+gray+black
评论详情: (My info: 5’8, 130, 36DDD, 37-29-37) I ordered a Medium and they fit perfect! I needed a longer tank to be able to tuck into my jeans at work because cropped tanks are not allowed. And these fit the bill even though I wear high-rise jeans. They stay tucked in, don’t pop out, and are super comfortable and keep their shape all day long. I don’t find myself having to readjust the tank. I.e. pull it down tuck it back in adjust the girls, etc. it stays in place for a full 8 to 12 hours that I’m mixing drinks and running around behind the bar.  I’m a huge fan of ribbed tanks because they tend to hold up and keep their shape better, longevity wise, than traditional cotton for long-term abuse and workwear. I wear the black one multiple times a week for work and it always looks great. It shows just enough of the girls to encourage tips, but not be obscene.  Note I also ordered these tanks in the traditional square next style in medium, but they were too big so I will be ordering those ones in a small so just be aware that your sizing may vary style by style.

评论详情: I am really happy with the fit and quality of these little crops. I have worn them to the gym, as a bralette, layering piece, etc. I would not recommend them for a sports bra replacement for any impact or power/hot yoga. Lost a star because the reason I bought the color set was for the beautiful jade green top, and it is 100% navy blue.

类型: Special Size: Crop LengthSize: X-Small-SmallColor: White+gray+black
评论详情: I like to wear these under a tee that has a wide or deep neckline.  They are pretty enough to be worn alone as a workout crop top.  I tried both the waist length and the crop length and liked the crop better on me and that length worked better under my tees as they are a bit cooler and I live in a very hot and humid climate.  Amazon made it easy to return and reorder.  In any case, these are very comfortable and do not add too much compression.  Since they have the wide straps, I can wear a racer back bra underneath them and it looks great.  The quality is great.  I would not hesitate to order more.  In fact, I have!  A lot of people evidently use these as a dupe for a more expensive, mainstream brand.  Having tops from both companies, I actually prefer these as they have less compression and are softer plus they are less expensive!  These come in lots of colors.  I am very pleased with this purchase.

类型: Special Size: Waist LengthSize: Medium-LargeColor: White+gray+black
评论详情: Love love love these tanks to layer and work out in! Super stretchy, great quality, and so many colors to choose from
